017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.util;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import java.util.concurrent.Semaphore;
023
024import org.apiguardian.api.API;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.internal.AutoSemaphoreImpl;
027
028/**
029 *  <p>{@summary An implementation of
030 *  {@link Semaphore}
031 *  that allows to be used with {@code try-with-resources}.}</p>
032 *  <p>Use this class like this:</p>
033 *  <pre><code>
034 *  final static final int MAX_AVAILABLE = …
035 *  final AutoSemaphore semaphore = AutoSemaphore.of( MAX_AVAILABLE );
036 *  …
037 *  try( final var token = semaphore.acquireToken() )
038 *  {
039 *      // Do something …
040 *  }
041 *  catch( final InterruptedException e )
042 *  {
043 *      // Handle the exception …
044 *  }
045 *  </code></pre>
046 *
047 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: HexUtils.java 747 2020-12-01 12:40:38Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.4.8
050 *
051 *  @UMLGraph.link
052 */
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: HexUtils.java 747 2020-12-01 12:40:38Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
055public sealed interface AutoSemaphore
056    permits AutoSemaphoreImpl
057{
058        /*---------*\
059    ====** Methods **==========================================================
060        \*---------*/
061    /**
062     *  <p>{@summary Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one
063     *  is available, or the thread is
064     *  {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupted},
065     *  and returns a token object that is used for
066     *  {@code try-with-resources}.}</p>
067     *  <p>Acquires a permit, if one is available and returns immediately,
068     *  reducing the number of available permits by one.</p>
069     *  <p>If no permit is available then the current thread becomes disabled
070     *  for thread scheduling purposes and lies dormant until one of two things
071     *  happens:</p>
072     *  <ul>
073     *    <li>Some other thread invokes the
074     *    {@link Semaphore#release() release()}
075     *    method for this semaphore and the current thread is next to be
076     *    assigned a permit; or</li>
077     *    <li>Some other thread
078     *    {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupts}
079     *    the current thread.</li>
080     *  </ul>
081     *  <p>If the current thread:
082     *  <ul>
083     *    <li>has its interrupted status set on entry to this method; or</li>
084     *    <li>is
085     *    {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupted}
086     *    while waiting for a permit,
087     *  </ul>
088     *  then
089     *  {@link InterruptedException}
090     *  is thrown and the current thread's interrupted status is cleared.
091     *
092     *  @return The token.
093     *  @throws InterruptedException    The current thread was interrupted.
094     */
095    public default AutoCloseable acquireToken() throws InterruptedException { return acquireToken( 1 ); }
096
097    /**
098     *  <p>{@summary Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore,
099     *  blocking until all are available, or the thread is
100     *  {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupted},
101     *  and returns a token object that is used for
102     *  {@code try-with-resources}.}</p>
103     *   <p>Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and
104     *   returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by the
105     *   given amount. This method atomically acquires the permits all at
106     *   once.</p>
107     *   <p>If insufficient permits are available then the current thread
108     *   becomes disabled for thread scheduling purposes and lies dormant until
109     *   one of two things happens:</p>
110     *   <ul>
111     *       <li>Some other thread invokes one of the
112     *       {@link Semaphore#release() release()}
113     *       methods for this semaphore and the current thread is next to be
114     *       assigned permits and the number of available permits satisfies
115     *       this request; or</li>
116     *       <li>Some other thread
117     *       {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupts}
118     *       the current thread.</li>
119     *  </ul>
120     *  <p>If the current thread:
121     *  <ul>
122     *      <li>has its interrupted status set on entry to this method; or</li>
123     *      <li>is
124     *      {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupted}
125     *      while waiting for a permit,
126     *  </ul>
127     *  <p>then an
128     *  {@link InterruptedException}
129     *  is thrown and the current thread's interrupted status is cleared. Any
130     *  permits that were to be assigned to this thread are instead assigned to
131     *  other threads trying to acquire permits, as if permits had been made
132     *  available by a call to
133     *  {@link Semaphore#release() release()}.</p>
134     *
135     *  @param  permits The number of permits to acquire.
136     *  @return The token.
137     *  @throws InterruptedException    The current thread is interrupted.
138     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given number of permits to
139     *      acquire is negative.
140     */
141    public AutoCloseable acquireToken( final int permits ) throws InterruptedException, IllegalArgumentException;
142
143    /**
144     *  <p>{@summary Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one
145     *  is available, and returns a token object that is used for
146     *  {@code try-with-resources}.}</p>
147     *  <p>Acquires a permit, if one is available and returns immediately,
148     *  reducing the number of available permits by one.</p>
149     *  <p>If no permit is available then the current thread becomes disabled
150     *  for thread scheduling purposes and lies dormant until some other thread
151     *  invokes the
152     *  {@link Semaphore#release() release()}
153     *  method for this semaphore and the current thread is next to be assigned
154     *  a permit.</p>
155     *  <p>If the current thread is
156     *  {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupted}
157     *  while waiting for a permit then it will continue to wait, but the time
158     *  at which the thread is assigned a permit may change compared to the
159     *  time it would have received the permit had no interruption occurred.
160     *  When the thread does return from this method its interrupt status will
161     *  be set.</p>
162     *
163     *  @return The token.
164     */
165    public default AutoCloseable acquireTokenUninterruptibly() { return acquireTokenUninterruptibly( 1 ); }
166
167    /**
168     *  <p>{@summary Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore,
169     *  blocking until all are available, and returns a token object that is
170     *  used for {@code try-with-resources}.}</p>
171     *  <p>Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and
172     *  returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by the
173     *  given amount. This method atomically acquires the permits all at
174     *  once.</p>
175     *  <p>If insufficient permits are available then the current thread
176     *  becomes disabled for thread scheduling purposes and lies dormant until
177     *  some other thread invokes one of the
178     *  {@link Semaphore#release() release()}
179     *  methods for this semaphore and the current thread is next to be
180     *  assigned permits and the number of available permits satisfies this
181     *  request.</p>
182     *  <p>If the current thread is
183     *  {@linkplain Thread#interrupt interrupted}
184     *  while waiting for permits then it will continue to wait and its
185     *  position in the queue is not affected.  When the thread does return
186     *  from this method its interrupt status will be set.
187     *
188     *  @param  permits The number of permits to acquire.
189     *  @return The token.
190     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given number of permits to
191     *      acquire is negative.
192     */
193    public AutoCloseable acquireTokenUninterruptibly( final int permits ) throws IllegalArgumentException;
194
195    /**
196     *  Returns a reference to the raw semaphore.
197     *
198     *  @return The semaphore.
199     */
200    public Semaphore getSemaphore();
201
202    /**
203     *  Creates an {@code AutoSemaphore} instance with the given number of
204     *  permits and non-fair fairness setting.
205     *
206     *  @param  permits The initial number of permits available. This value may
207     *      be negative, in which case releases must occur before any acquires
208     *      will be granted.
209     *  @return The new {@code AutoSemaphore} instance.
210     */
211    public static AutoSemaphore of( final int permits ) { return new AutoSemaphoreImpl( permits ); }
212
213    /**
214     *  Creates an {@code AutoSemaphore} instance with the given number of
215     *  permits and the given fairness setting.
216     *
217     *  @param  permits The initial number of permits available. This value may
218     *      be negative, in which case releases must occur before any acquires
219     *      will be granted.
220     *  @param  fair    {@code true} if this semaphore will guarantee first-in
221     *      first-out granting of permits under contention, else {@code false}.
222     *  @return The new {@code AutoSemaphore} instance.
223     */
224    public static AutoSemaphore of( final int permits, final boolean fair ) { return new AutoSemaphoreImpl( permits, fair ); }
225}
226//  class AutoSemaphore
227
228/*
229 *  End of File
230 */
